name: Easy Javadoc
description:
This plugin can help you complete the Chinese javadoc document quickly.
Support three type of javadoc: field, method and class.
easy_javadoc source code and document

能帮助开发者快速生成类、方法、属性等中文javadoc
notes:
This plugin can help you complete the Chinese javadoc document quickly.
Support three type of javadoc: field, method and class.
